WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I'm trying to generate an excel file and almost everything works fine but i'm having trouble with 2 features.
I've found the method showRowColHeaders() but i'd like something like printRowColHeaders() to force it in my printing options when i generate the file. I can't find any method to do that.

I'm also having some problems with the method setAlignWithMargins(). It works fine for Excel2007 but it doesn't work at all for Excel5 ? Is this method only available for Excel2007 ?

Thanks in advance :)
WorkItem.Summary: Print row col header and setAlignWithMargins
